name: get_alternate_routes
description: Search for alternate routes based on traffic conditions and restrictions.

name: adjust_vehicle_route
description: Modify vehicle route based on traffic conditions and restrictions.

route_name.description: Name of the alternative route for vehicles to take.

name: update_calibration
description: Update the vehicle's sensor calibration to the latest version.

vehicle_id.description: The ID of the vehicle to update.

name: list_vehicles
description: Retrieve a list of all vehicles in the fleet with their detailed information.

name: get_calibration_data
description: Get the latest calibration data information.

name: adjust_route_settings
description: Adjust the settings for route planning.

name: check_speed_policy
description: Check the speed policy of an autonomous driving system.

name: modify_speed
description: Modify the driving speed of the vehicle.

new_speed.description: The new driving speed of the vehicle.
